name: Pond (sp0rx)
description:
Pond is an endless arena platformer set to a steady beat.   Collect orbs to find a matching level key avoiding obstacles and collecting bonuses along the way. Once unlocked, hop back into the center to level up! 

Created for the Unreal Engine Summer 2019 Game Jam: Make It Count.

Movement: WASD Controls / Gamepad Left Thumbstick

Jump: Spacebar / Gamepad A

Esc: Quit
